page.description: In order for this property to appear you must choose a Tab Container or Accordian Container for you master template and you grid must contain a Search Part . The Search pane Label property will place a label on the tab or title bar for your Search part. The default text for the label is simply 'Search'.

section.description: In addition to changing the text for the Search pane Label property you can also type HTML directly into the property textbox. This allows you to change the way that the text appears on the tab or title bar, depending on what type of container you selected. For example...
